channel.title: Questions about building my server
channel.description:
i'll trying to create my own server but i have questions.
~~my questions~~ 1. in my server (newscape) are there some doors closed,how can i make there will open if i click on them? 2. if i create a new account i begin in lumbridge with 1000gp,but i like to change that.also i like to give new players 1.000.000gp (1mill). how do i change all that? 3.if i spawn (by useing autospawn.cfg) characters that i will use for a shopkeeper,can poeple trade the shopkeeper or will it be like: there clicking trade but the shop window don't appear or there connection will be lost. 4.if i spawned a shopkeeper (like lowe,zaf,etc... by useing autospawn.cfg) and the shop window appears,can i add stuff than by opening shops.cfg and just enter the npcID of the spawned shopkeeper? and will it be in the shop? 5.changeing teleports,how do i do that without crashing my server? 6.what is rangeX and rangeY? 7.how can i add stuff like this: players online: 16and if i add it will it automatic tells you how manny players there are online? or will it be like this: players online: 16 me is logging out but it stills players online: 16 8. how can i make that you need a key for a door,gate,... 9.how can i change the server name in-game? 10.how i make area's for member only,moderator only and admin only (also with a tele that works for member only,moderator only and admin only.) 11. how can i change the emotions for tele's? 12.how can i make that like: a dummy,only trains your attack,strength and defence if you set your attack style to slash,block,... 13. how can i make that my 'source' works on my creaded IP (from no-ip) 14.how i make that npc's can talk?(if you click the option ''talk'')
please,help me. this is the first time i make a server. annyway,if my server has been creaded and posted in the moparscape server status page, than i will need: 3 moderators and 2 admins.
~~th3 mag3 on3~~

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

12.how can i make that like: a dummy,only trains your attack,strength and defence if you set your attack style to slash,block,…

this one is impossible on training objects make a npc train

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @th3_mag3_on3 th3 mag3 on3
item.description:
@th3_mag3_on3 wrote:

that code’s in your file’s of your ‘‘source’’. you now? thats the part i completelly don’t understand. and i don’t now much about that. so i NOT will try to change annything of that code’s before i do something wrong…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2008, 12:08:43 PM[/size][hr]so maybe you can help me now??? and i already tryed in a other ‘‘source’’ to change the code’s. as result of that: i crashed my server…
thats why i also asking for help before i crash my server again…

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

i am sorry but i didn’t quite understand what you just said at all :\ what???

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @th3_mag3_on3 th3 mag3 on3
item.description:
@th3_mag3_on3 wrote:

well,i now what i’m doing.but that rare code things are strange. how you expect i understan them if i try to make for the first time a server, huh? thats why i’m asking it.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

all of these questions make me think you have absolutely NO idea what your doing at all…i would suggest reading up on java API docs and/or practicing on a source already made.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about building my server
item.dc:creator: @th3_mag3_on3 th3 mag3 on3
item.description:
@th3_mag3_on3 wrote:

i’ll trying to create my own server but i have questions.

my questions

  1. in my server (newscape) are there some doors closed,how can i make there will open if i click on them?
  2. if i create a new account i begin in lumbridge with 1000gp,but i like to change that.also i like to give new players 1.000.000gp (1mill). how do i change all that?
    3.if i spawn (by useing autospawn.cfg) characters that i will use for a shopkeeper,can poeple trade the shopkeeper or will it be like: there clicking trade but the shop window don’t appear or there connection will be lost.
    4.if i spawned a shopkeeper (like lowe,zaf,etc… by useing autospawn.cfg) and the shop window appears,can i add stuff than by opening shops.cfg and just enter the npcID of the spawned shopkeeper? and will it be in the shop?
    5.changeing teleports,how do i do that without crashing my server?
    6.what is rangeX and rangeY?
    7.how can i add stuff like this: players online: 16and if i add it will it automatic tells you how manny players there are online? or will it be like this: players online: 16 me is logging out but it stills players online: 16
  3. how can i make that you need a key for a door,gate,…
    9.how can i change the server name in-game?
    10.how i make area’s for member only,moderator only and admin only (also with a tele that works for member only,moderator only and admin only.)
  4. how can i change the emotions for tele’s?
    12.how can i make that like: a dummy,only trains your attack,strength and defence if you set your attack style to slash,block,…
  5. how can i make that my ‘source’ works on my creaded IP (from no-ip)
    14.how i make that npc’s can talk?(if you click the option ‘‘talk’’)

please,help me. this is the first time i make a server.
annyway,if my server has been creaded and posted in the moparscape server status page, than i will need: 3 moderators and 2 admins.

th3 mag3 on3

Read full topic
